page.title: 17Housing In Wash Common
page.content: In our block there is a modern housing estate where most of the children in our school live. These houses are detached, semi-detached and terraced 2, 3 or 4 bedroomed. On the country road we saw what looked like one big long bungalow but it was't it was 3 bungalows joined together with a shed joined with a cable. In the country there are mostly old cottages with small leaded windows. Along the road we saw about 3 farms with pretty farm cottages. At Woolton Hill there is a small estate which has mostly modern houses but a few old houses. In Woolton Hill it is mostly countryside with a few farms. The prices of houses in the area are quite high. A four bedroomed detached house with two garages is about Â£82,000. There are quite a few houses on the market.
